document:
<sentence id="s1" text="RT-PCR analysis showed that the overall transcriptional activity of the main HS biosynthesis-involved genes (li>EXT1, li>EXT2, li>NDST1, li>NDST2, li>GLCE, li>HS2ST1, li>HS3ST1, li>HS3ST2, li>HS6ST1, li>HS6ST2, li>SULF1, li>SULF2, li>cell-matrix adhesion) was decreased by 1.5-2-fold in Grade II-III glioma (li>p AAAA 0.01) and by 3-fold in Grade IV glioma (glioblastoma multiforme, GBM) (li>p AAAA 0.05), as compared with the para-tumourous tissue.">
<sentence id="s2" text="Heparanase (li>cell-matrix adhesion) expression was identified in 50% of GBM tumours by immunostaining, and was characterised by a high intratumoural heterogeneity of the presence of the cell-matrix adhesion protein.">
